question: What is "Due process"?
possible_answers: A. The government must respect all of the legal rights a person is entitled to under the law.
B. The rule of law and freedom under the law
C. The impartial manner in which the laws are administered
answer: A. The government must respect all of the legal rights a person is entitled to under the law.
explanatory_sentence: Due process is the principle that the government must respect all the legal rights a person is entitled to under the law.
